messages.content: Your vote on Thursday will decide who leads Scotland’s opposition to Nicola Sturgeon’s SNP. Me or Kezia Dugdale.

messages.title: We need a Strong Opposition to keep the SNP in check
messages.content: The SNP’s dominance means they’ve become complacent. And the danger is they’ve said they’ll kick start a new drive for independence.

messages.title: Under Kezia Dugdale, Labour are too weak to hold the SNP to account
messages.content: In nine years, Labour haven’t laid a glove on the SNP. And I just can’t see them doing so now when they are riddled with infighting and crippled by indecision.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide a strong opposition to the SNP, focusing on real-world issues like health, jobs and schools, and putting the divisions of the independence referendum behind us.

quotes.text: The SNP are set to win, risking a new drive for independence.
I refuse to stand by and watch as Scotland gets a second class opposition.
Only Ruth Davidson will provide the strong opposition Scotland needs.

images.caption: Ruth Davidson for a Strong Opposition
